name: Lost Robot (itch) (CallMeCalvin101)
description:
Created by Dongling Yang, Michael Leung, Vincent Bouyssounouse, and Vincent Kurniadjaja.

A robot awakes in an unknown location, however, they are just only a head. Venture through this abandoned landscape to gain new body parts and to find an exit.

WASD for movement, Left mouse key for an attack.
